analysis.description:
Reentrancy in MenloSaleBase.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/12/0xdd782bc3c2593e6229b42806c1928e864f74fe57.sol#552-601):
	External calls:
	- checkFinalize() (/unique_chucks/12/0xdd782bc3c2593e6229b42806c1928e864f74fe57.sol#557)
	- require(bool,string)(token.balanceOf(this) > 0,This contract must have tokens) (/unique_chucks/12/0xdd782bc3c2593e6229b42806c1928e864f74fe57.sol#564-567)
	- _totalTokens > token.balanceOf(this) (/unique_chucks/12/0xdd782bc3c2593e6229b42806c1928e864f74fe57.sol#575-584)
	- _weiAmount = token.balanceOf(this).div(calculateBonusRate()) (/unique_chucks/12/0xdd782bc3c2593e6229b42806c1928e864f74fe57.sol#583)
	- token.unpause() (/unique_chucks/12/0xdd782bc3c2593e6229b42806c1928e864f74fe57.sol#584)
	- token.pause() (/unique_chucks/12/0xdd782bc3c2593e6229b42806c1928e864f74fe57.sol#599-600)
	- checkFinalize() (/unique_chucks/12/0xdd782bc3c2593e6229b42806c1928e864f74fe57.sol#600)
	External calls sending eth:
	- forwardFunds(_weiAmount) (/unique_chucks/12/0xdd782bc3c2593e6229b42806c1928e864f74fe57.sol#585)
	- msg.sender.transfer(_weiToReturn) (/unique_chucks/12/0xdd782bc3c2593e6229b42806c1928e864f74fe57.sol#588-592)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalized (/unique_chucks/12/0xdd782bc3c2593e6229b42806c1928e864f74fe57.sol#600)

MenloSaleBase.refund (/unique_chucks/12/0xdd782bc3c2593e6229b42806c1928e864f74fe57.sol#602-616) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- _tokens == 0

Reentrancy in MenloSaleBase.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/12/0xdd782bc3c2593e6229b42806c1928e864f74fe57.sol#552-601):
	External calls:
	- checkFinalize() (/unique_chucks/12/0xdd782bc3c2593e6229b42806c1928e864f74fe57.sol#557)
	- require(bool,string)(token.balanceOf(this) > 0,This contract must have tokens) (/unique_chucks/12/0xdd782bc3c2593e6229b42806c1928e864f74fe57.sol#564-567)
	- _totalTokens > token.balanceOf(this) (/unique_chucks/12/0xdd782bc3c2593e6229b42806c1928e864f74fe57.sol#575-584)
	- _weiAmount = token.balanceOf(this).div(calculateBonusRate()) (/unique_chucks/12/0xdd782bc3c2593e6229b42806c1928e864f74fe57.sol#583)
	- token.unpause() (/unique_chucks/12/0xdd782bc3c2593e6229b42806c1928e864f74fe57.sol#584)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/12/0xdd782bc3c2593e6229b42806c1928e864f74fe57.sol#584-585)

MenloTokenSale.buyTokensHook (/unique_chucks/12/0xdd782bc3c2593e6229b42806c1928e864f74fe57.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,_tokens) (/unique_chucks/12/0xdd782bc3c2593e6229b42806c1928e864f74fe57.sol)
